channel.title: Bad Luck or Bad Calculations?
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Bad Luck or Bad Calculations?" - A reaper mission

item.title: Re: Bad Luck or Bad Calculations?
Re: Bad Luck or Bad Calculations?
item.content:encoded: One way is to use Spot and Red Rover in a team for 2 successes then use the Ring of Wisdom for another gen. success and you will auto-win it.

item.title: Bad Luck or Bad Calculations?
item.content:encoded: Alright. I'm trying to find Shorty to begin reaper missions. The genjustu mission is killing my lv. 16 Chuunin. His genjust stat is 4 which is low, so I put Li.Shammy in my group, Bugman, and K-Dog went also. I had the heckbutterfly bonus as well of course. But failure still plagues me. So I try the disguise justu. Yet failure failure failure.
